tag_list: ajay, ajay-arumugam, arumugam, socialtab, stuforest, michigan, michigan-state
overview:
Ajay Arumugam is a Michigan State University alumnus, earning a Bachelor’s degree in Communications and a Bachelor’s degree in Economics with a Business Management minor. Ajay is responsible for daily business operations, marketing, business strategy, financing, creation of company culture, human resources, compliance with state and federal regulations, advertising, and PR.

Ajay brings broad knowledge of the social media industry, and strategic business management skills. He is one of the foremost experts in social media, project management and entrepreneurship. He has consistently been recognized for his knowledge and expertise, and for his ability to accomplish the near impossible.

Considered a leader in business operations, he is experienced in building strong management teams and has been responsible for all major company functions, including marketing, product development, strategic planning and business management.

An active philanthropist, he is involved with many organizations, including the American Red Cross, where he volunteers regularly. In addition, he is also a disaster relief volunteer and has frequently volunteered at Sparrow Hospital and McLaren-Lansing.
